DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 8-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Prunus Mume Extract Improvement Constipation . The investigator measure Improvement Constipation parameter , include Colonic Transit Time , number bowel movement , defecation time , stool type , color stool amount per defecation , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Prunus Mume Extract Improvement Constipation
DOC.criteria: Males female 1940 year old Subject functional constipation ROME IIII criterion Subject 36 hour colonic transit time Able give inform consent Subject Irritable bowel syndrome ROME IIII criterion Allergic hypersensitive ingredient test product History reaction test product gastrointestinal disease Crohn 's disease gastrointestinal surgery History alcohol substance abuse Participation clinical trial within past 2 month Laboratory test , medical psychological condition deem investigator interfere successful participation study Pregnant lactate woman etc .
